codelibDesc: Code Repositories service can link your existed SVN and GIT repositories to CI，which will be a pipeline's materials
noPermissionDesc: You do not have the permission for create, please switch the project or apply for permission accordingly
gitCredPlaceholder: Please select crendential of SSH private key+private Token
gitlabCredPlaceholder: Please select credential of type AccessToken
svnSshRule: Start by svn+ssh:// and the correct one
gitlabSshRule: Start by git@ and end with .git
httpRule: Start by http:// or svn:// and the correct one
httpsRule: Start by https:// and end with .git
httpOrHttpsRule: Start by http:// or https:// and end with .git
portTips: The name of the machine hosting the shared version control service, TCP/IP and PORT must be specified.If using SSL to connect to P4, use ssl:host:port
tgitHttpRule: Start by https:// and end with .git
tgitRule: Start by git@ and end with .git
creator: Creator
pacTips: Under Pipeline As Code mode, pipelines are orchestrated using YAML files in the .ci directory of the code repository, and changes to YAML files will be automatically synchronized to the corresponding BlueKing pipeline.
可以尝试 调整关键词 或: You can try adjusting keywords or
确认离开当前页？: Are you sure to leave now?
离开将会导致未保存信息丢失: Your changes will be lost if you close without saving.
如需重置，请先点击按钮授权。: If need to reset, please authorize first.
尚未授权，请先点击按钮授权。: Not yet authorized, please authorize first.
此授权用于平台和代码库进行交互，涉及如下功能：: 此授权用于平台和代码库进行交互，涉及如下功能：
注册 Webhook 到代码库，用于事件触发场景: 注册 Webhook 到代码库，用于事件触发场景
回写提交检测状态到代码库，用于代码库支持 checker 拦截合并请求场景: 回写提交检测状态到代码库，用于代码库支持 checker 拦截合并请求场景
流水线中 Checkout 代码: 流水线中 Checkout 代码
需拥有代码库注册 Webhook 权限: 需拥有代码库注册 Webhook 权限
同一个代码库可以关联到多个蓝盾项目，但仅支持在一个蓝盾项目下开启 PAC (Pi: The same repository can be associated with multiple BlueKing projects, but only supports PAC (Pipeline As Code) mode under one BlueKing project.
PAC 模式下，使用代码库 ci 目录下的 YAML 文件编排流水线，且 YAM: In PAC mode, the YAML file in the ci directory of the repository is used to arrange the pipeline, and YAML file changes will be automatically synchronized to the corresponding BlueKing pipeline.
当前代码库已在【】项目中开启 PAC 模式: The repository has enabled PAC mode in the project [{0}]
检测到默认分支仍存在ci 文件目录。: It is detected that the default branch still exists in the .ci file directory.
ci目录已改名或删除: The .ci directory has been renamed or deleted
确定重置授权为 OAUTH，同时开启 PAC 模式吗？: Reset authorization to OAUTH and enable PAC mode?
以下流水线仍在使用此代码库: The following pipelines are still using this repository
请前往流水线处理后，再删除代码库: Please go to the pipeline for processing before deleting the repository.
新增 YAML 时，当前项目下将新增一条对应的流水线: When a new YAML is added, a corresponding pipeline will be created under the current project
修改 YAML 后，新触发自动以最新的 YAML 配置为准: After modifying the YAML, new triggers will automatically use the latest YAML configuration
确认以此事件重新触发流水线 X 吗？: Confirm to Re-trigger pipeline [{0}] with this event?
满足基础过滤条件后，根据第三方接口返回判断是否能够触发: After meeting the basic filter conditions, judge whether it can be triggered according to the return of the third-party interface
将使用此事件重新触发关联的流水线: Will be re-trigger the associated pipeline by this event.
确认以此事件重新触发流水线X吗？: Re-trigger the pipeline [{0}] with this event？
重置授权会使正在运行的流水线中已获取到的授权信息失效，从而导致执行失败，请谨慎操: Caution: Resetting authorization may cause running pipelines to fail.
代码库部分 YAML 文件同步失败: Partial synchronization failure of YAML files in the code repository
检测到代码库中以下流水线 YAML 文件同步失败，请处理后重试: The following pipeline YAML files failed to synchronize in the code repository. Please handle and retry
避免项目成员从代码库查看时误认为 YAML 文件仍生效: Avoid project members mistakenly thinking that YAML files are still effective when viewing from the code repository
无该代码库权限: No permission for this code repository
你没有该代码库的查看权限，请申请权限: You do not have permission to view this code repository, please apply for permission
该代码库不存在，请切换代码库: This code repository does not exist, please switch to another code repository
请先关闭 PAC 模式，再删除代码库: Please close PAC mode before deleting the repository
代码库下管理的流水线: Pipelines managed under the code repository
以下流水线通过别名方式使用此代码库: The following pipelines use this repository through aliases
别名变更后，使用旧别名引用的流水线将引用不到当前代码库，请评估变更是否合理: After the alias is changed, pipelines that reference the old alias will not be able to reference the current repository. Please assess whether the change is reasonable.
PAC 模式下不允许修改别名: Alias modifications are not allowed in PAC mode
重放此事件，符合条件的流水线将触发执行: Replay this event will trigger the execution of pipelines that meet the conditions
重放此事件，仅触发当前流水线: Replay this event, will only trigger the current pipeline
相同代码库只支持在一个蓝盾项目下开启 PAC 模式: The same repository only supports enabling PAC mode under one Blue Shield project.
codelibUndeployTitle: {0} connection service has not been fully deployed
githubUndeployDesc: To use this feature, please contact the platform administrator to register the GitHub APP
